narrative.narrative: Air Carnival is an Indian airline that started flying in July 2016. Its hub is Chennai and it has another base at Coimbatore. It only charged the equal value of 1 and a half cents for its first flight between its two bases. Besides the route between its bases it flies the routes of Chennai-Madurai,Chennai-Tiruchirapalli,and Coimbatore-Madurai. At September 2016 it had one ATR 72-500.
